# CollisionEvents.Updated

**Structure**

An event raised on every frame when two objects are in contact.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Updated
```

## Getting the involved entities

- **entityA**: The first entity involved in the collision.
- **entityB**: The second entity involved in the collision.

## Characterizing the collision

- **impulse**: The total impulse in this collision pair obtained by adding up all the individual impulses applied at each contact point
- **position**: A position representing the estimated point of contact.

## Instance Properties

- **contacts**: All contacts between the collision pair. Empty if all contact information is not requested.
- **impulseDirection**: The direction of the total impulse in scene coordinate space.
- **penetrationDistance**: The estimated distance of overlap between the two colliding entities in scene coordinate space.

## Detecting collisions

- **CollisionEvents.Began**: An event raised when two objects collide.
- **CollisionEvents.Ended**: An event raised when two objects, previously in contact, separate.

## Conforms To

- Event
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
